籤詩版本二:
Void knot, ndinoshuvira kukuchengeta, kana iwe wakachengetedza muviri wako, ndinoshuva kuti haungaudzosere.
Usakanganwe kuti nyasha dzaMwari dzadzoserwa.Musashore mashoko aMwari.
詩意:
Usatende kuti iyi hexagram ichokwadi.
Chiratidzo chekuchengetedza mune zvese.
解曰: Vanhu vane maonero avo. Pfungwa hadzifaniri kubatikana. Guanyin mirayiridzo. Usazvidza.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kutsigira pachivande mureza webhuronzi
Mukuru ane mukurumbira akavamba mukuru weTang Dynasty, Qin Qiong (Qin Shubao) akapiwa zita reGrand Marshal weSui Dynasty.Akatungamirira mauto ake kunorwisa Sishui Pass (kana kuti Sishui Pass kana kuti Dongling Pass, ngano dzinosiyana).Yang Lin ( Yang Yicheng), murindi mukuru weSishui Pass, akanga ari Emperor Yang weSui Dynasty akaraira kuti mureza wendarira ugadzirwe, asi Qin Shubao haana kukwanisa kuurwisa kwenguva refu. Mushure mekuziva kuti Luo Cheng, mutungamiriri wesangano, aive hama yake, akafonera tete vake.
Luo Cheng asati aenda, akaudza amai vake kuti munhu akauya kuzopidigura mureza aiva hama yake Qin Qiong, uye amai vake vakamurayira kuti amubatsire muchivande. Pazuva rehondo yakasimba, Luo Cheng, akange akarinda mureza weBronze, akangoerekana achinja mativi ndokubatana naQin Qiong kuti akunde kuumbwa kweBronze Flag. Luo Cheng akatora Dongling Pass akadzoka achikunda. Dynasty.
(Nyaya iyi idimikira rekuti dzimwe nguva unofanira kuvimba nepfungwa paunenge uchiita zvinhu, pane kuvimba nemanzwiro kana kutenda.)
聖意: Mumba munodawo kuita zvitsidzo, kutsvaga hupfumi, kuchengeta mugove, kungwarira pakutengeserana, kuroora manyepo, kuzvara musikana, vanofamba netsoka vanogara mumunda, makonye, ​​zvibodzwa nomwe, kukuvara kwezvipfuwo zvitanhatu, kushaya vanhu, veruzhinji. mhosva, kutama, pfuma yakarasika, zvirwere zvekumadokero, mhinduro kumakomo, makuva, kumadokero
